@patrick478 yeah, don't think for a minute he meant to cause harm, but tackler has to be responsible for the speed/force when it goes wrong.
@patrick478 also, Twitter wouldn't be a thing without emotion, so go nuts!
@patrick478 I just saw it and it looks exactly like the FIFA red card tackle coaching videos.
@patrick478 I saw the gif of that, doesn't look great. Still happy with the red. If I gave red and saw the replay, I'd be happy I caught it.
@patrick478 when a player is running that fast, there can't not be high force, if that kind of tackle catches a standing leg it breaks it.
@patrick478 studs showing, high speed, plenty of force, foot up off the ground, almost over ball height. I'm seeing lots of red boxes ticked
@patrick478 phwoah! I've not watched anything but the highlights of the goals and the red card. It looks pretty straightforward red to me...
